thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Gavin Williams
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Gavin Williams

author: Gavin Williams
title: Gavin Williams
text:
We went to Japan for ten days in December, booked Japan Rail Passes in advance, and found them extremely useful and a very efficient way of seeing a lot of Japan during our stay - and thoroughly enjoyed our bullet train journeys.
Would recommend to anyone going to Japan looking at travelling around Japan unless just staying put in one place.
